QuestData.Title: Armaments of War
QuestData.RewardText: War comes, $N, and with it comes untold horrors. You have done all that could be asked of you and for that you should be rewarded.$B$BShould this... this prophecy ever come to pass...$B$B<Geologist Larksbane turns pale.>$B$BThe future of us all could be at an end.$B$BThese armaments will prove invaluable to your campaign in this desert.
